definition: lifetime/generation/group of people/class/classifier for generations/(literary) classifier for people

sentences.english: Our people had not seen white men before. We thought they were sprites.
sentences.chinese: 我辈族人之前从未见过白人，还误以为他们是鬼魂。

sentences.english: He was a shining example of greatness in every respect.
sentences.chinese: 他在各个方面都是我辈的光辉典范。

sentences.english: We wait in silence for these times when sense can be made.
sentences.chinese: 我辈于沉默之中守候，等待生命意义显现之日。

sentences.english: Men of Yiliao are high-hearted guys who look down on the people like us.
sentences.chinese: 像市南宜僚这样清高的人，他们是瞧不起我辈人士的。

sentences.english: “It is our intention not to be in a liquidity trap”, he said.
sentences.chinese: 他说，”流动性陷阱并非我辈所愿。

definition: a sage/wise and holy man/virtuous ruler/Buddhist lama/wine
to dedicate oneself to the service of one's country
Gentlemen! (start of a speech)/Ladies and Gentlemen!
lit. an ant trying to shake a tree/to overrate oneself (idiom)
outstanding talent/wise and able person/illustrious individual
since ancient times/it has ever been the case that/see also 自古以來|自古以来[zi4 gu3 yi3 lai2]
